My god is everybody going cuckoo? Why do people think its easy to design sites. Why does everybody want that you give them world class designs in one day ! For me designing a site is first getting to understand what the client wants, and how to basically give him a good layout which actually helps him. I mean how do i understand, research and create a layout in one freaking day. I have always been a person who works really good under pressure. Give me work with 15 days to it, chances are ill only work for 7 days on it, but ill finsih it on time :). In my last 6 years of experience i have been able to give almost 90% of my work on time. But now deadlines are getting to my head..... maybe i need to relax, have a chilled drink and go out for 2-3 hours ..... HAVE FUN, TAKE CARE Pixel Pusher
